root.TEXT:

Warfarin SODIUM 0.5 MG (1MG TABLET take 0.5) PO QPM , Takes total of 5.5 mg QD.

Evaluation of treatment of:
1.Reverted to afib over spring.
Cor- No chest pain. Occ DOE. No palpitations. No lighthead. No PND. No orthopnea. No claudication. No edema.
2. DM well controlled. HgB A1C=6.7 9/79. Eye exam 4/79.
Endocrine: No polydipsia, polyuria, polyphagia, weight change, sweats,heat intolerance.
LDL=44.
3. Last visit given Metrogel for rosacea. No change. Needs derm eval and treatmetn of probable actinic keratoses.
4. C/O occ hoarse. No sore throat. Occ dry. Worse after arguing. NO reflux. Oc dyspepsia.
No ETOH or cigs.
5. GU- no dysuria; no hematuria. No dc. nocturia x 2; NO frequency. NO Hx STD.
Vital Signs
BP 102/74, P 76, RR 14
WD,WN,NAD
Skin facial erythema. Telangiectasia. With scaley areas.
M&T- lips and gums unremarkable. Moist; no erythema; no exudate; no lesions

Pulm- NO accessory muscle use. Percussion- normal. Palpation-normal. Auscultation-clear.
Cor- irreg rhyhm. S1S2 normal. No gallop. No rub. NO murmer.
Abdo- normal BS;soft with no HSM. No mass. No tenderness
DRE-sphincter normal. No lesions. Prostate- small, firm, smooth, no nodules. Stool brown-heme neg.
Ext- no edema. PT-+2
ASS: R/O actionicn keratoses
